alert.note: Alert for Pitt (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 24 at 9:33AM EST until December 25 at 10:36AM EST by NWS Newport/Morehead City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina... Tar River At Greenville affecting Pitt County. For the Tar River...including Greenville...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Tar River at Greenville. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 13.0 feet, Minor flooding of low lying areas adjacent to the river can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 9:00 AM EST Sunday the stage was 14.3 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 9:00 AM EST Sunday was 14.7 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage late tonight and continue falling to 7.0 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps. The next statement will be issued late tonight at 1245 AM EST.
